thread.title: 19 of the Craziest Lipsticks on the Internet
thread.title_full: 19 of the Craziest Lipsticks on the Internet

title: 19 of the Craziest Lipsticks on the Internet
text: By Devon Abelman abelw0man February 7, 2017 Cherry reds, hot pinks, and chocolatey nudes have nothing on the new wave of bold lipsticks. Lately, cosmetic companies like Bite Beauty, Kat Von D, and Make up For Ever are covering the complete color spectrum. Meet the most bizarre blue, eccentric eggplant, and quirkiest green lipsticks we could possibly find on the Internet. We dare you to try all of these rainbow shades—just not at once. Courtesy of brand The Estée Edit Mattified Lipstick in The Storm This steely teal is fit for a mermaid . Courtesy of brand Milani Color Statement Lipstick in Sweet Nectar This bright orange lives somewhere between fresh-picked citrus and a construction worker's safety vest, and as weird as that sounds, we're into the summery shade. Courtesy of brand Too Faced La Crème Color Drenched Lipstick in Unicorn Tears In the tube, this may look like a holographic sky blue, but Unicorn Tears actually swipes on as an iridescent lilac (and causes the Internet to freak out in the process). Courtesy of brand Make Up For Ever Artist Rouge Lipstick in Peacock Green We swear this won't make your lips look like you smeared toothpaste all over them. Trust.
